data.title: Things to do in Santa Teresa Gallura in April – Wanderlog
data.meta_description: Discover events happening in Santa Teresa Gallura in April and activities that are perfect for a April trip to Santa Teresa Gallura.
data.text:
Overview

April is a good time to visit Santa Teresa Gallura. The weather is usually mildly cool with a gentle breeze, with temperatures ranging from 53—64°F (12—18°C).

Santa Teresa Gallura has plenty to offer for visitors of all ages and interests. In this article, we tell you the top things to see and do for your April trip to Santa Teresa Gallura. Get inspired by the events, activities, attractions, and experiences unique to April. We’ll let you know where to explore events based on your interests, whether that’s food, culture, art, music, sport or others.

We’ll let you know everything you need to prepare for the weather in Santa Teresa Gallura in April. Learn about what to wear and pack for your trip, the average temperatures throughout April, temperature changes from morning to evening and much more.

Visiting Santa Teresa Gallura? See our Santa Teresa Gallura Trip Planner.

Weather in Santa Teresa Gallura in April

Temperatures on an average day in Santa Teresa Gallura in April

The average temperature in Santa Teresa Gallura in April for a typical day ranges from a high of 64°F (18°C) to a low of 53°F (12°C). Some would describe it as mildly cool with a gentle breeze.

For comparison, the hottest month in Santa Teresa Gallura, August, has days with highs of 85°F (29°C) and lows of 72°F (22°C). The coldest month, February has days with highs of 55°F (13°C) and lows of 47°F (8°C). This graph shows how an average day looks like in Santa Teresa Gallura in April based on historical data.

What to wear

What to wear in April

With an average high of 64°F (18°C) and a low of 53°F (12°C), it generally feels mildly cool with a gentle breeze. With that in mind, most people would dress in something moderately warm like a sweater
